tool_description: Filters a list of file paths based on file size criteria, supporting minimum and maximum size bounds with various units.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to filter by size

size_unit.description: Size unit: bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB

error_messages: Empty file list: Provide at least one file path to filter.
Invalid size range: max_size must be greater than min_size.
Invalid size unit: Use one of [bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB].
File access error: One or more files cannot be accessed for size information.
Invalid size values: min_size must be >= 0 and max_size must be positive if specified.
usage: Provide an array of file_paths and optionally set min_size, max_size, and size_unit. Files within the specified size range will be returned.

filtered_files.description: Array of file paths that match the size criteria

files_removed.description: Number of files excluded by the size filter

avg_file_size.description: Average size of filtered files in specified unit
